The Anomalous Quintet bring their straight-up funk to the Wonder Ballroom on Saturday (June 7), a benefit for Artists for the Arts. Critic Lynn Darroch introduces you to the group and previews the show. Listen here: Download here. The Anomalous Quintet b

I recently managed to grab a quick 15 minutes on the phone with Colin Meloy, frontman for the Decemberists who's now on tour supporting a new solo album. You've already heard him talk about Record Store Day, but here's a bit more from that

Portland band Amelia has a beautiful, melancholy new CD, "A Long, Lovely List of Repairs," and they're hitting local stages so you can hear it. They play Saturday at Aladdin Theater, Tuesday at Music Millenium and April 27 at Towne Lounge.
